articles.author: Connor McDonagh
articles.title: 'No one knew what the problem was' - Hamilton details Mercedes 2023 struggles - Crash
articles.description: Seven-time F1 world champion Lewis Hamilton has detailed why Mercedes struggled at the start of 2023 - and why his personal frustration boiled over.
articles.content:
Even though Mercedes struggled in 2022 - the first year of these technical regulations - they retained a similar car philosophy for F1 2023, maintaining the same zero-pod design.
In hindsight it see… [+1977 chars]
